mapper.insert: insert into notes (noteNo, recv_id, sent_id, title, content, date_sent) values (seq_noteNo.nextVal, #{recv_id}, #{sent_id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from notes where noteNo = #{ noteNo }
mapper.update: update notes set recv_read = 'Y' where noteNo = #{ noteNo }
update notes set sent_del = 'Y' where noteNo = #{noteNo}
update notes set recv_del = 'Y' where noteNo = #{noteNo}
mapper.select: select * from notes where sent_id = #{empNo} and sent_del = 'N'
select * from notes where recv_id = #{empNo} and recv_del = 'N'
